weekly_top_story.headline: Death toll surpasses 1,400 after devastating earthquake in eastern Afghanistan
weekly_top_story.summary: A 6.0 magnitude earthquake near the Pakistan border has killed over 1,400 people and injured thousands, triggering urgent international humanitarian aid and highlighting the region's vulnerability to natural disasters.

stories.headline: India unveils its first semiconductor chip amid strong Q1 economic growth
stories.summary: Prime Minister Modi unveiled India's first domestically produced semiconductor chip at Semicon India 2025, coinciding with the announcement of a robust 7.8% GDP growth for FY26 Q1, signaling a leap in technological self-reliance and economic momentum.

stories.headline: Singapore Prime Minister Lawrence Wong begins visit to strengthen India ties
stories.summary: Singapore PM Lawrence Wong's September 2–4 visit to India aims to deepen bilateral cooperation, enhancing strategic partnerships in trade, technology, and geopolitical alignment in the Indo-Pacific region.

stories.headline: UPI processes record 20 billion digital transactions in August 2025
stories.summary: India's Unified Payments Interface (UPI) hit a milestone with 20 billion transactions in August, reflecting a 34% year-over-year growth and marking a major advance in digital payment adoption and financial inclusion.
